entry.title: Deadweight
entry.summary:
Author: AwakeUnafraid

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,638Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 149

Summary: Jason Todd is bad at sleeping, bad at feelings, and bad at keeping his distance. You are bad at Mortal Kombat. Somehow, this results in a situation that is neither of your faults (but is absolutely Jason's fault). It's not like this is gonna be a regular thing... right?
